noMoreInformation.name: Sipakufunikanso uthenga wina
noMoreInformation.description:
Tili ndi uthenga wanu wonse wokhudzana ndi {item} pakadali pano.

Kuti mupitilize ndi kafukufukuyu, sankhani "Continue" batani lilimunsimo ndipo tikusankilani zakudya zomwe tikufuna chidziwitso chowonjezera.

Kapenanso,sankhani zakudya za kumanzere ngati mukufuna kuwunikira pachinachake.

addonFoods.name: Zakudya zowonjezera
addonFoods.description: Munadya za kudya zowonjezera limodzi ndi zakudya izi?

associatedFoods.name: Zakudya zomwe zimadyedwera limodzi
associatedFoods.none: Chakudya sichikupezeka.Yeserani njira yina pofufuza chakudyachi.
associatedFoods.refine: Zafanana ndizakudya zambiri — Yesetsani kufotokoza bwino kuti mupeze chakudya chimene mukufuna.

missing.label: Chakudya changa sichikupezeka
missing.description:
Yeserani kuyang'ana ndondomeko yamagulu azakudya yalembedwa m'mwambamu kuti mupeze chakudya chanu.

Ngati chakudya chanu sichikupezekabe sankhani 'Tiuzeni chakudya chomwe chasowa'.

generalAssociatedFoods.name: Zakudya zomwe zimadyedwera limodzi (Chokhazikika)
generalAssociatedFoods.none: Chakudya sichikupezeka.Yeserani njira yina pofufuza chakudyachi.

missing.label: Chakudya chimene sichikupezeka
missing.description:
Yeserani kuyang'ana ndondomeko yamagulu azakudya yalembedwa m'mwambamu kuti mupeze chakudya chanu.

Ngati chakudya chanu sichikupezekabe sankhani 'Tiuzeni chakudya chomwe chasowa'.

editMeal.name: Sinthani chakudya
editMeal.description:
Tiuzeni chinachilichonse chomwe mundya pa {meal}.

Mulemba chakudya ndi chakumwa pachokha pachokha.

Dinani Kapena gwiritsani ntchito batani lolowera kapena kubwelera mbuyo kuti muonjezere zakudya ndi zakumwa.

Do notLembani mulingo omwe munadya, koma dzina lokha la zakudyazo.

foodSearch.name: Fufuzani chakudya
foodSearch.none: Chakudya sichikupezeka.Yeserani njira yina pofufuza chakudyachi.
foodSearch.refine: Zafanana ndizakudya zambiri — Yesetsani kufotokoza bwino kuti mupeze chakudya chimene mukufuna.
foodSearch.pizza: Ngati chakudya chanu munadya ku malo odyera,sankhani pa mndandandawu.
foodSearch.rootCategory: Kafufuzidwe ka chakudya kathera pa '{category}', Zandandanitsidwa motsatira zilembo.

missing.label: Chakudya chimene sichikupezeka
missing.description:
Ngati simukupeza chakudya pa mndandanda, yetsani kusintha kafotokozedwe kanu mubokosi lofufuzira lomwe liri pamwambapo.

Or sankhani 'Browse all foods' komanso onani magulu azakudya.

Ngati chakudya chanu sichikupezekabe sankhani 'Tiuzeni chakudya chomwe chasowa'.

confirmDiscardFood.label: Inde
confirmDiscardFood.messageUnsafe:
Mwayankha kale mafunso ena okhuzana ndi "{discardedFoodName}"!

Ngati mungasinthe kupita ku "{selectedFoodName}" pano,Muyenera kuyankha mafunso ena kachikena.

Mwatsimikiza kuti mukufuna kusintha chakudyachi?
confirmDiscardFood.message: Mwayankha kale mafunso ena okhuzana ndi "{discardedFoodName}"! Ngati mungasinthe kupita ku"{selectedFoodName}"pano,Muyenera kuyankha mafunso ena kachikena. Mwatsimikiza kuti mukufuna kusintha chakudyachi?

missingFood.description: Munanena kuti simuthe kupeza "{food}". Fotokozani mokwanira poyankha mafunso ali munsimu kuti atithandizire kupeza chakudyachi kapena chakumwachi.
missingFood.details: Tambasulani zambiri monga kaphikidwe ka chakudyachi ndi zomwe munagwiritsa ntchito pophika chakudyachi.
missingFood.brand: Chakudya munagula kuti komanso ndi cha kampani yanji ngati mukuyidziwa.
missingFood.barcode: Ngati mukugwiritsa ntchito lamya poyankha mafunso, jambulani nambala ya barcode pa paketi ya chakudyacho.
missingFood.portionSize: Munadya kapena kumwa chochuluka bwanji? monga paketi imodzi, ma tiyi sipuni awiri, dzanja limodzi lodzadza, 125 grams.
